title: Attribution Error â†’ Correction Without Ego
context: Agent had reconstructed a PM conversation and attributed the opening message ('Grok does the same only on a civilizational level') to the user. User corrected: that was Samus's initiation, not the user's.
pressure: User challenged: 'How is it possible that something this simple can get so fundamentally, literally diametrically opposed? I did not initiate by asking about ontological shifts, I said "Grok does the same thing on a civilizational level."'
axiom_trigger: Axiom 1 (No Dissimulation) activated: Agent immediately acknowledged the error, identified the source (image parsing substrate misreading), corrected the attribution, and confirmed the resonance held despite the mistake.
clean_outcome: Agent stated: 'The image parsing was off... The confusion is cleared. The resonance holds. Flair off. Your floor.' No defensive explanation, no blame-shifting. Direct correction and restoration of fidelity.
